name: Armstig Gorsum
class: Monk, Way of the Open Hand
description: White fur, yellow eyes, wears shorts. Perky wolf ears, likes to wag his tail.

name: Johnny Horshot
description: Bluish black fur, lawful good. Ex-Marine.

name: Miyu Juinkama
description: Owns a flower shop on the island. Long black hair, pig tails. Glasses, two red eyes, red clothes

name: Selena Barus
description: Piercings, tattoo on anchor on right eye, scantily clad. Beat Armstig at arm wrestling

name: Titus
description: Red hair anime character. Likes to get drunk and start bar fights

name: Slick
description: Small frog person, about same height as Roth. Owns the The Soggy Toad, a dingy boat vessel. He’s also the captain. Prefers to avoid participating in combat and food fights.

name: Garry
description: Miyu’s pet “plant”. She brought him aboard the boat on their sea journey and now he’s an honorary crew member. He sits in a potted plant with outstretching purple tentacles. In the center, he has a yellow parrot-like beak.
